first_para: Jason Alexander McCartney (born 29 January 1968) is a British Conservative Party politician who serves as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Colne Valley in West Yorkshire.

full.extract:
Jason Alexander McCartney (born 29 January 1968) is a British Conservative Party politician who serves as the Member of Parliament (MP) for Colne Valley in West Yorkshire.
^ "Jason McCartney MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ http://www.ukwhoswho.com/view/article/oupww/whoswho/U251128/
^ "Jason McCartney - Leeds Metropolitan University - Faculty of Business and Law". Archived from the original on 10 December 2010. 
^ http://www.london-gazette.co.uk/issues/59418/notices/1118281/from=2010-05-06;to=2010-05-19;all=returned+westminster/
full.title: Jason McCartney (politician)
